ModMetaData.name: Categorized Meats
ModMetaData.author: Tutankhamun
ModMetaData.description:
Simplifies meat types. Instead of having 100+ meat types cluttering the game and decreasing performance, the meats were categorized.
Meat categories: Feline Canine Fox Elephant Rhinocheros Bear Lizard Rodent Equine Bird Venison Pork Beef Mutton (Sheep) Goat Poultry Hare Primate Human Insect
Mods supported: Alpha Animals Bastyon Devilstrand Animals Dinosauria Erin's Mountain Animals Forsakens: Fauna Galaxy Life Magical Menagerie Megafauna RimBeast Rimcraft Animals Star Wars Animals Collection Vanilla Animals Expanded — Boreal Forest Vanilla Animals Expanded — Desert Vanilla Animals Expanded — Cats and Dogs Vanilla Animals Expanded — Tropical Forest Vanilla Animals Expanded — Endangered (v1.1) Vanilla Animals Expanded — Australia (v1.1) Vanilla Animals Expanded — Extreme Desert (v1.1) Vanilla Animals Expanded — Royal Animals (v1.1) Vanilla Animals Expanded — Temperate Forest (v1.1) Vanilla Animals Expanded — Tropical Swamp (v1.1)
